infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: EcoDive needs your location to show nearby dive sites and log dive locations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: EcoDive needs your location to show nearby dive sites and log dive locations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: EcoDive needs access to your photos to upload profile pictures and dive photos.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: EcoDive needs access to your camera to take photos for your profile and dives.

plugins.photosPermission: EcoDive needs access to your photos to upload profile pictures and dive photos.
plugins.cameraPermission: EcoDive needs access to your camera to take photos for your profile and dives.
